00105 //----------------------------------------------------------
00107 template< typename _Vec >
00108 inline
00109 float
00110 MPlane::Dist( const _Vec& point ) const
00111 {
00112         return( _normal.Dot( point ) + _d );
00113 }
00114 
00115 //----------------------------------------------------------
00117 template< typename _Vec >
00118 bool
00119 MPlane::GetSegmentIntersect( _Vec& pt, const _Vec& pt0, const _Vec& pt1 ) const
00120 {
00125         float d0 = Dist( pt0 );
00126         float d1 = Dist( pt1 );
00127         if ( ( d0 < 0.0f ) == ( d1 < 0.0f ) )
00128         {
00130                 return false;
00131         }
00132 
00135         d0 = Abs( d0 );
00136         d1 = Abs( d1 );
00137         float t = d0 / ( d0 + d1 );
00138         pt = Lerp( pt0, pt1, t );
00139 
00141         return true;
00142 }
00143 
00144 //----------------------------------------------------------
00146 template< typename _Vec >
00147 bool
00148 MPlane::GetRayIntersect( float& rayMu, const _Vec& rayOrigin, const _Vec& rayDir ) const
00149 {
00151         float rayDist = Dist( rayOrigin );
00152 
00155         if ( ApproxEqual( rayDist, 0.0f, FLT_EPSILON ) )
00156         {
00157                 rayMu = 0.0f;
00158                 return true;
00159         }
00160 
00162         float cosTheta = -_normal.Dot( rayDir );
00163 
00166         if ( ApproxEqual( cosTheta, 0.0f, FLT_EPSILON ) )
00167         {
00168                 return false;
00169         }
00170 
00173         rayMu = rayDist / cosTheta;
00174 
00176         return true;
00177 }
00178 
00179 //----------------------------------------------------------
00180 template< typename _Triangle, typename _Vec >
00181 void
00182 MPlane::SplitTriangle( const _Triangle& tri, _Triangle *posTris, _Triangle *negTris, unsigned int& posCount,
00183                                           unsigned int& negCount, float epsilon ) const
00184 {
00185         posCount = 0;
00186         negCount = 0;
00187 
00189         float d0 = Dist( tri.pt0 );
00190         float d1 = Dist( tri.pt1 );
00191         float d2 = Dist( tri.pt2 );
00192         int vertPosCount = ( ( d0 >= epsilon ) + ( d1 >= epsilon ) + ( d2 >= epsilon ) );
00193         int vertNegCount = ( ( d0 <= -epsilon ) + ( d1 <= -epsilon ) + ( d2 <= -epsilon ) );
00194 
00196         if ( vertPosCount == 3 || vertNegCount == 0 )
00197         {
00198                 *posTris = tri;
00199                 posCount = 1;
00200                 return;
00201         }
00202         else if ( vertNegCount == 3 || vertPosCount == 0 )
00203         {
00204                 *negTris = tri;
00205                 negCount = 1;
00206                 return;
00207         }
00208 
00211         posCount = vertPosCount;
00212         negCount = vertNegCount;
00213 
00215         if ( vertPosCount != vertNegCount )
00216         {
00217                 if ( ( d0 >= 0.0f ) == ( d1 >= 0.0f ) )
00218                 {
00219                         _Vec intersect0;
00220                         _Vec intersect1;
00221                         GetSegmentIntersect( intersect0, tri.pt2, tri.pt0 );
00222                         GetSegmentIntersect( intersect1, tri.pt2, tri.pt1 );
00223 
00225                         if ( d2 >= 0.0f )
00226                         {
00228                                 posTris[ 0 ] = _Triangle( intersect0, intersect1, tri.pt2 );
00229 
00231                                 negTris[ 0 ] = _Triangle( tri.pt0, tri.pt1, intersect0 );
00232                                 negTris[ 1 ] = _Triangle( intersect0, tri.pt1, intersect1 );
00233                         }
00234                         else
00235                         {
00237                                 negTris[ 0 ] = _Triangle( intersect0, intersect1, tri.pt2 );
00238 
00240                                 posTris[ 0 ] = _Triangle( tri.pt0, tri.pt1, intersect0 );
00241                                 posTris[ 1 ] = _Triangle( intersect0, tri.pt1, intersect1 );
00242                         }
00243                 }
00244                 else if ( ( d1 >= 0.0f ) == ( d2 >= 0.0f ) )
00245                 {
00247                         _Vec intersect1;
00248                         _Vec intersect2;
00249                         GetSegmentIntersect( intersect1, tri.pt0, tri.pt1 );
00250                         GetSegmentIntersect( intersect2, tri.pt0, tri.pt2 );
00251 
00253                         if ( d0 >= 0.0f )
00254                         {
00256                                 posTris[ 0 ] = _Triangle( tri.pt0, intersect1, intersect2 );
00257 
00259                                 negTris[ 0 ] = _Triangle( intersect1, tri.pt1, tri.pt2 );
00260                                 negTris[ 1 ] = _Triangle( intersect1, tri.pt2, intersect2 );
00261                         }
00262                         else
00263                         {
00265                                 negTris[ 0 ] = _Triangle( tri.pt0, intersect1, intersect2 );
00266 
00268                                 posTris[ 0 ] = _Triangle( intersect1, tri.pt1, tri.pt2 );
00269                                 posTris[ 1 ] = _Triangle( intersect1, tri.pt2, intersect2 );
00270                         }
00271                 }
00272                 else
00273                 {
00274                         B_ASSERT( ( d2 >= 0.0f ) == ( d0 >= 0.0f ) );
00276                         _Vec intersect0;
00277                         _Vec intersect2;
00278                         GetSegmentIntersect( intersect2, tri.pt1, tri.pt2 );
00279                         GetSegmentIntersect( intersect0, tri.pt1, tri.pt0 );
00280 
00282                         if ( d1 >= 0.0f )
00283                         {
00285                                 posTris[ 0 ] = _Triangle( intersect0, tri.pt1, intersect2 );
00286 
00288                                 negTris[ 0 ] = _Triangle( intersect2, tri.pt2, tri.pt0 );
00289                                 negTris[ 1 ] = _Triangle( intersect2, tri.pt0, intersect0 );
00290                         }
00291                         else
00292                         {
00294                                 negTris[ 0 ] = _Triangle( intersect0, tri.pt1, intersect2 );
00295 
00297                                 posTris[ 0 ] = _Triangle( intersect2, tri.pt2, tri.pt0 );
00298                                 posTris[ 1 ] = _Triangle( intersect2, tri.pt0, intersect0 );
00299                         }
00300                 }
00301         }
00302         else
00303         {
00305                 if ( d0 < epsilon && d0 > -epsilon )
00306                 {
00308                         _Vec intersect;
00309                         GetSegmentIntersect( intersect, tri.pt1, tri.pt2 );
00310                         if ( d1 >= 0.0f )
00311                         {
00312                                 posTris[ 0 ] = _Triangle( tri.pt0, tri.pt1, intersect );
00313                                 negTris[ 0 ] = _Triangle( tri.pt0, intersect, tri.pt2 );
00314                         }
00315                         else
00316                         {
00317                                 negTris[ 0 ] = _Triangle( tri.pt0, tri.pt1, intersect );
00318                                 posTris[ 0 ] = _Triangle( tri.pt0, intersect, tri.pt2 );
00319                         }
00320                 }
00321                 else if ( d1 < epsilon && d1 > -epsilon )
00322                 {
00324                         _Vec intersect;
00325                         GetSegmentIntersect( intersect, tri.pt2, tri.pt0 );
00326                         if ( d2 >= 0.0f )
00327                         {
00328                                 posTris[ 0 ] = _Triangle( tri.pt1, tri.pt2, intersect );
00329                                 negTris[ 0 ] = _Triangle( tri.pt1, intersect, tri.pt0 );
00330                         }
00331                         else
00332                         {
00333                                 negTris[ 0 ] = _Triangle( tri.pt1, tri.pt2, intersect );
00334                                 posTris[ 0 ] = _Triangle( tri.pt1, intersect, tri.pt0 );
00335                         }
00336                 }
00337                 else if ( d2 < epsilon && d2 > -epsilon )
00338                 {
00340                         _Vec intersect;
00341                         GetSegmentIntersect( intersect, tri.pt0, tri.pt1 );
00342                         if ( d2 >= 0.0f )
00343                         {
00344                                 posTris[ 0 ] = _Triangle( tri.pt2, tri.pt0, intersect );
00345                                 negTris[ 0 ] = _Triangle( tri.pt2, intersect, tri.pt1 );
00346                         }
00347                         else
00348                         {
00349                                 negTris[ 0 ] = _Triangle( tri.pt2, tri.pt0, intersect );
00350                                 posTris[ 0 ] = _Triangle( tri.pt2, intersect, tri.pt1 );
00351                         }
00352                 }
00353         }
00354 }
